title: Garen Skin Idea I Had
body:
I thought of an idea for a good quality Garen skin recently.
He could have the groucho glasses and be wearing a suit.
His sword would be his massive blade sticking out of a suit case.
When he spin moves papers would fly everywhere.
His E could be translucent office supplies and his ult could be an office desk falling out of the sky and landing on the targeted champion.
When he dies his suitcase could burst open and he tries to collect his things but falls to the ground and dies instead.
The recall animation should be an office desk and chair appears and Garen just sits down and leans back on the chair
I couldn't really think of an idea for his q but even without a different animation for it it could be a high quality skin

I would attempt to draw concept art for this put the only thing i can draw with on my pc is paint and i don't have a drawing tablet

replies.body: This reminded me of shower garen from the old forums. Man that was good quality.
Lol! cute. I don't think the R with the desk would work, it's a bit square - maybe a giant umbrella instead....? xD
